text: Ana nganinyyimanya ya achakulungwakulungwa mu wanache wa Israila panyuma pa (kuwa) Musa, katema kawansalile Ntume jwao (jwali Samuyele) kuti: “Ntusagulile nchimwene kuti tupute ngondo petala lya Allah?” Jwalakwe watite: “Mwinetu wanganyammwe ngawa nkuputa ngondojo pati jilamulidwe kukwenu.” Wanganyao watite: “Chantiuli tukaputa ngondo petala lya Allah kutendaga tukoposyedwe mmajumba mwetu, ni wanache wetu (akamwilwe ni amagongo)?” Nambo ndema jakwalamulidwe kwa jamanjao kuputa ngondo wagalawiche ikaweje wannono mwa wanganyao, sano Allah ni jwaakwamanya chenene wakulitenda lupuso
